title: Heritage Boutique Charm in Coastal Merimbula
description:
Nestled on the south coast of New South Wales is Merimbula, a seaside village that is the jewel of the Sapphire Coast. Discover its azure waters, sandy beaches, picturesque lake and fresh seafood, with a stay at the newly refurbished boutique hotel Hillcrest Merimbula.

This reimagined heritage property welcomes you with an outdoor swimming pool, tennis court and sea views, all just a short walk from the glittering waters of Merimbula Lake. Spend your days at the beach, following walking trails, exploring the rainforest and national parks, and sampling fresh local produce on the seaside esplanade with a cocktail or beer in hand.

title: Newly Re-Opened NSW South Coast 70's-Inspired Retreat
description: The newly reopened Hillcrest Merimbula is a fully renovated 70's-style motel done up with a warm, relaxing vibe, perfect for your next South Coast holiday. With charming wicker cane furnishings and a pleasant beige palatte, guests will drift away to heaven perched on Merimbula's heights, overlooking the lake and oyster farms below. Spend your days by the pool, keep cosy at night by the firepit or enjoy a tinned local brew and snack from the in-house honesty bar.
